features: ★ [1.7 inch HD Touch Screen & Personalized Watch Faces ] 1.7" large color screen and full screen touch ensures smooth operations. 240*240 resolution give you a better color saturation and reproduction. Customizing your smart watch with multiple watch faces provided in the app or with your own pictures, makes your watch stylish and unique.

★ [Heart Rate & Blood Oxygen & Sleep Monitor ] This smartwatch will accurately monitor your heart rate in real time. Also, it provides a detailed analysis of your sleep quality by continuously recording your sleep patterns. During exercise, Cloudpoem smartwatch automatically records daily steps, Distance Counter, calories burned, active minutes, and supports tracking of 24 sports modes, measure your blood oxygen saturation to help you understand your physical state.

★ [Long-lasting Battery & IP68 Waterproof] The large battery capacity (260mAh) and low power consumption design offers longer endurance. It could last about 10 days when in auto monitoring mode for heart rate or 7 days when in the instant detection mode. Cloudpoem Smart Watch is designed with IP68 waterproof rating, so no need to worry when you wear it while swimming or sweating out.

★ [Smart Watch for iPhone/Android Phones ] Cloudpoem Smart Watch is compatible with most iOS and Android phones. Go to App Store or Google Play to download and install “Smart Wristband 3” for free, then connect this smart watch to your phone and start your journey of smart life.

★ [More useful functions] This watch has many useful functions, including message notification, checking the weather, controlling mobile phone music, stopwatch, timer, adjustable brightness and screen-on duration, finding phone, do not disturb mode, flashlight, etc.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Accurate Fitness Tracker Watch Cloudpoem G16 Smart watch adopts the latest sensors and scientific date algorithm, which can calculate your steps, distance and calories more accurately. You can check the corresponding data on the watch at any time. And the watch supports 24 sports modes, which helps you better understand your daily physical activity. Heart Rate Monitor & Blood Oxygen Meter Cloudpoem G16 watch can monitor your heart rate automatically every 5 minutes all day. You can also manually track your real-time heart rate on the watch. The blood oxygen monitor can help you better know your blood oxygen level and lead a healthy lifestyle. You can view the Day/Week/Month/Year data graph in the ‘smart wristband 3’ app. Auto Sleep Tracker When you wear the watch correctly on your wrist, it will automatically monitor your sleep quality at night. You can view the sleep quality analysis directly on your watch, or go to the 'smart wristband 3' App to view more information.

Smart Watch for iPhone and Android Phones By connect the G16 watch with your iphone or android phone, the watch will remind you of vibriation when there is phone calls, messages, WhatsApp, Facebook, etc. You can reject calls on your watch. The 1.7" HD Screen of the watch make you to see each message more clearly (Note: Answering call asnd sending messages is not supported). Customize Your Own Style You can define the watch face yourself. In the app 'smart wristband 3', we have a very rich dial market, you can download and use it, or you can choose any photo from yoour phone as the dial. Long battery life Cloudpoem smartwatch has a large battery capacity, you can use it with confidence, it can bring you more than seven days of battery life after a full charge.

IP68 waterproof Fitness Watch Cloudpoem G16 smart watch is IP68 waterproof . You can wear the watch to wash your hands and swim or take a bath, but the watch is not resistant to hot water. Music control When connected, the watch can control your phone to play music and adjust the volume. When you are inconvenient to use the phone, you can operate it directly through the watch. Stop Watch, Timer and More functions Cloudpoem G16 sport watch has many useful functions, including stop watch, timmer, remoting control camera, checking the weather, , adjustable brightness and screen-on duration, sedentary reminder, finding mobile phone, do not disturb mode, flashlight, etc. To meet your work and life needs.

FAQ Q1: How to connect the watch with your phone? Download the 'smart wristband 3' app, then find the watch in the app and bind. (Make sure the bluetooth of your phone is turned on, dont connect directly in the bluetooth list) Method: Open the 'smart wristband 3' App, tap Device, tap Bind device, choose the 'smart watch' and bind, allow bluetooth pairing request and tap complete. It support Bluetooth 4.0, and it can work with most smartphones that use iOS 9.0 or Android 5.0 or above system (not work for PC and tablet). Q2: What should I do if the device fails to connect? 1. Please check whether the watch device is connected by other smart phones. If it is connected by other smart phones, please disconnect from 'smart wristband 3' App and forget this device in the Bluetooth of this smart phone. 2. Before the watch is connected to the App, please make sure that there is no smart watch connected with your smart phone. Then enter the ''smart wristband 3'' App to connect to the smart watch. 3. If still no use reInstall the 'smart wristband 3' App and try again. Q3: How to change the watch face? To switch the watch face on the watch, just press and hold for 3-5 seconds on the main interface to select the watch face. On the app side, open the ''smart wristband 3'' app, then select watch face settings - then select watch face center or custom watch face to operate. Q4: How to change length/weight unit? Please change them on the APP "Profile" - "Setting" - "Unit". Q5: How to set the screen-on duration and time display? Please set them on the APP, "Device" - "More Settings" - "Display Timeout"/ "24-hour System". Q6: How to get accurate activity data? 1. Please enter your personal information accurately in the APP; 2. When testing, please put the watch close to the skin and wear it tightly; 3. You can test it several times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A fantastic budget fitness tracker
reviews.reviewText: I only use this as a fitness tracker, and not a smartwatch, so I can't speak to smartwatch functions (like notifications/device control integration.) However, I have owned 2 other 'budget smartwatches' in the last few years, and I'm pretty pleased with this one. (The other 2 were a ~2018 VeryFitPro, and the TicWatch GTH, which I ditched after a few days, when I purchased this.)First: the battery life is amazing; better than the VeryFitPro and WAY better than the TicWatch. I have been using this watch for 31 days now, and I only charged it after unboxing... It's still holding 18%, so I could let it go another week or so.It's worth noting that, along with having notifications and device control options disabled, I also turned off 'lift-to-wake' and automatic blood oxygen measurements (though the measurements I have taken were as-expected.) I imagine that while battery life would not be as stellar with nothing disabled, but it would still be great.Heart rate monitoring and step counts seem to be accurate and to track consistently. Data syncs are quick (and usually happen automatically.) The app does take a little 'sleuthing' to find different options, and some of the translations are confusing/inaccurate (such as the options for displaying distance being 'metric system' or 'British system,' which should say 'imperial system.') there is also a bug that will prompt you to visit the Play store to download an update when none is available. Despite these, however, the app is still decent compared with the apps for the other two watches I mentioned... ALSO, the watch face library is immersive (even in comparison with the Apple Watch!)I will say that sleep tracking leaves something to be desired, BUT I keep irregular hours (almost never sleeping at night,) and like most similar smartwatches it seems, this only tracks sleep at night-- and assumes one is sleeping, or trying to, when you're not even supine. I very much wish that these companies would let the user set a custom schedule, or even just have the option to turn sleep tracking on manually. Because it's such a commonplace problem, I don't fault Cloudpoem... But it does make it impossible for me to say that sleep tracking is accurate.I also really appreciate Cloudpoem making the band so easy to replace; you can use any standard 20mm watch band.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great all around Fitness Tracker and Watch with an easy to read screen with good features
reviews.reviewText: This is a really good fitness tracker an watch and is an upgrade from my previous one. I have had a lower priced FitBit and another fitness tracker before this one I prefer this one. My previous tracker did not allow for true customized screen although they had options. This one has way more screen customization and I can change it to use one of my own pictures too. The band is comfortable and the screen size is appreciated too without being too big. The battery life is great. It has lasted 6 days of use with tracking mode activated twice each day and the next week the battery lasted 7 days. I actually forgot to charge that second week and when I realized I didn't it still had 9% left. That kind of battery life was one thing I was hoping for. I did not want a watch I had to charge daily. The tracking of exercises is good as well. It has many different kind of fitness tracking movements you can chose including walking, badminton and gymnastics as well as many others. I forgot to take it off and it got soaked and it was all good, thankfully it is water proof. It also has an SP02 sensor as well. One thing that it does not have is Google Fit integration but I don't miss that. I can still add the actions manually to Fit later. The watch will hold up to 7 days worth of data so you have time to pass that information on and even longer if you look for that info in the app. The app that is used is the Smart Band 3 app, you can pull that from appropriate app store. It is pretty simple to use and allows the customization of the watch/tracker. I have it setup to let me know when I need to move and I was able to adjust that time period, something I could not do with either or my previous trackers. There are no in box instructions on the use of the app but it is not that difficult to navigate it.I have had this purchase for almost a month now and have no no real complaints with it. All in all, I would recommend it and would buy it again if I lost it or it got damaged in some way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Watch for the Price
reviews.reviewText: This is my second time buying a watch from this company. This one is a little different from the first. Overall it is a very nice watch. Looks good and does not feel cheap. It does not have a ton of features, but has all the basic fitness features. Everything I need for sure. Battery life is good. It was not even fully charged when I put it on and I have worn it for 4 days straight and have not had to charge it yet. I am not sure about the accuracy. The calorie count it shows seems very low. At 7:30 pm with almost 10,000 steps it shows 278 calories. My one complaint/suggestion for improvement is that I feel like there are very few instructions on how to actually use the features - almost none. The little booklet that comes with it shows what features there are and a picture of what they look like on the phone, but there is not really any instruction on how to operate them. It tells you how to download the app and pair or "bind" it to your watch and how to charge it, but that is about it. The watch is supposed to display text messages and give call alerts, but so far it hasn't for me, even though I have the SMS reminder turned on. I think there is a photo feature of some sort too, but I have no clue how to work that. I am not super techy and might just be doing something wrong, but without some better instructions I don't know what that is. The lack of instructions is why I only give it four stars. Otherwise I would not hesitate to give it 5 stars. At least at this point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Sleek, stylish watch and an excellent price point
reviews.reviewText: I bought this watch for my husband in black, to replace his old smart watch which broke. He is really impressed with this Smart watch. It fits really well and looks so stylish.We are surprised at how long it holds its battery for. My husband uses his watch every day and the battery just seems to go on forever!It was incredibly easy to set up and sync to his phone. I it gives a detailed breakdown of his sleep patterns. He suffers with poor sleep so this has been useful in helping him understand his sleep patterns. It also allows him to monitor his blood pressure and his oxygen levels, which is brilliant and you can monitor the amount of steps you do daily.The watch face is very stylish and easy to navigate. You can use it to make calls and read your messages.Overall he is really impressed with this watch - it does everything it says and more, is sleek, stylish and an excellent price point. Highly recommend!

ich habe mir die Smartwatch bestellt, da sie ein besseres Design des Vorgängermodells hat.Das Vorgängermodell hatte ich bereits und war damit ebenfalls voll zufrieden.ich trage die Uhr täglich und bin wiegesagt voll zufrieden!Die Uhr sieht richtig gut aus, ist angenehm beim tragen und hat super viele praktische Funktionen.Die Uhr hat eine Stoppuhr und Timer Funktion, sie misst den Puls, sie trackt den Schlaf und man kann alle Benachrichtigungen auf der Uhr empfangen.das Einzige was mir auffiel, dass man die Uhr nicht auf lautlos stellen kann (zumindest habe ich noch nicht rausgefunden wie).Aber alles in allem bin ich voll zufrieden, die Uhr sieht gut aus und funktioniert einwandfrei. Der Akku hält auch ungefähr eine Woche.Für den Preis top!vor allem liebe ich es, dass man sein eigenes Hintergrundbild einstellen kann, ich habe meine zwei Katzen als Bild eingestellt.Meine Handykamera hat die Bilder nur etwas überbelichtet 😄
Elegante, come orologio e come conta passi. Il cinturino è confortevole, ma genera calore e sudorazione sottostante.

La montre à énormément de fonctions.Elle est top pour différents types de sports (marche, course, rando montagne, équitation etc...)Mais aussi pour le sommeil (phases de sommeil : profond, léger...) elle vous indique la qualité ou non de celui ci. Elle donne également des conseils pour avoir un meilleur sommeil si celui-ci n'est pas bon ou optimal.Il y a différents cadrans à télécharger gratuitement même si le choix et selon moi un petit peu restreint (je n'ai pas trouvé le cadran qui me tape dans l'œil)Il y a aussi la possibilité de le personnaliser avec une photo perso, ce qui est vraiment chouette.Niveau batterie, je l'ai chargé complètement il y a 8 jours et il reste encore 45% aujourd'hui.Elle se recharge facilement avec un embout magnétique fournis.Elle est étanche en ce qui concerne la douche et le lavage de main. Je n'ai cependant pas testé en immersion complète. Mais d'autres avis répondent à cette question.L'application est facilement téléchargeable même sans le qr code.Elle est très simple d'utilisation.Vous pouvez connecté tous vos moyens de communication et ainsi voir vos messages SMS, whatsapp, messenger etc... La montre vibre et le début du message s'affiche.Pour les appels, la montre vous indique que vous en recevez mais vous ne pouvez pas décrocher, juste raccrocher.La montre à une fonction de recherche de téléphone. Très pratique si, comme moi, vous ne savez jamais où vous laisser votre portable. Vous enclenchez la recherche et votre téléphone se met à sonner avec la sonnerie d'un appel ou vibre s'il est en vibreur.Je suis sûre que j'oublie quelque chose mais elle est tellement polyvalente que c'est difficile de tout énumérer.Je suis vraiment ravie de mon achat qui pour un prix aussi dérisoire et vraiment parfait !Je recommande +++

El reloj es muy bonito, la correa de goma es perfecta porque tiene suficientes agujeros para ajustarla a mí diminuta muñeca que siempre me da problemas, la pantalla genial, trae varios modelos, pero además la puedes personalizar con la fotografía que tú quieras, la batería a mí me dura muchísimo, lo llevo 3 días y aún no está por la mitad, la pantalla táctil va muy bien y es sencilla, el temporizador es muy práctico, para hacer deporte también va genial, y las llamadas y mensajes también salen en la pantalla, además te informa de quién los envía, cosa que en otros relojes no. Yo estoy encantada, lo aconsejo. El color rosa palo con dorado rosa también es muy bonito, y el cargador es con imán, acopla muy fácil.
